ModMetaData.name: StuffCount
ModMetaData.author: TGC, bSun0000, ruyan
ModMetaData.description:
v1.6 Updated to Rimworld 1.4 Fixed Stockpiles Refractor stuff Cleaned up steam workshop items
v1.5 Updated to Rimworld 1.2
v1.4 Updated to Rimworld 1.1
v1.3 Adds counters to thing filters and material select float menu.
Can be added/removed at any time.
